(Simplified: 栾)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 䜌 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 䜌 [ luán ] chaos, distraction; to manage, to tie together
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
①落葉喬木。葉含鞣質，可制栲膠。花可入藥，又可作黃色染料。木材可制器具，種子可榨油。
②柱上的曲木，兩端以承斗拱。
③鐘口的兩角。
④古同“孿”，雙生子。
⑤姓氏。
欒城 [ luán chéng ]: Luancheng county in Shijiazhuang 石家庄 , Hebei
欒城縣 [ luán chéng xiàn ]: Luancheng county in Shijiazhuang 石家庄 , Hebei
欒川 [ luán chuān ]: Luanchuan county in Luoyang 洛阳 , Henan
欒川縣 [ luán chuān xiàn ]: Luanchuan county in Luoyang 洛阳 , Henan

欒字的基本解释

欒
luán
见“栾”。

欒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［luán］
［《廣韻》落官切，平桓，來。］
“栾1”的繁体字。
(1)木名。即栾华。
(2)古代乐器钟口的两角。
(3)建筑物立柱和横梁间成弓形的承重结构。
(4)瘦削。
(5)犹圆。方圆之圆。
(6)古邑名。春秋属晋，故址在今河北省赵县西北。
(7)通“孿”。双生子。
(8)通“鑾”。指古代帝王车驾所用之铃。详“欒車”。
(9)姓。汉有栾布。

欒字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　欒； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页564第01
【唐韻】路官切【集韻】【正韻】盧官切【韻會】盧丸切，?音鸞。【說文】木似欄。大夫冢樹欄楝也。【周禮·冢人疏】大夫墳高八尺，樹以藥草。【廣韻】作樹以欒。【山海經】雲雨之山有木名欒，黃木，赤技，靑葉，羣帝焉取藥。【唐本草】謂之欒荆。【註】欒荆，莖葉都似石南。　又【本草別錄】欒華，葉似木槿而薄細，花黃似槐而稍長大。　又欒欒，瘠貌。【詩·檜風】棘人欒欒兮。　又鐘口兩角爲欒。【周禮·冬官考工記】鳧氏爲鐘，兩欒謂之銑。【疏】古應律之鐘不圜，狀如今之鈴，故有兩角也。　又【禮·明堂位】鸞車，有虞氏之車也。【鄭註】鸞或爲欒。　又【博雅】曲枅謂之欒。【左思·吳都賦】欒櫨疉施。　又檀欒，竹貌。【枚乗·兔園賦】修竹檀欒。　又姓。【春秋】欒書之後，代爲晉卿。枚乘《菟園賦》。

考證：〔【註】古應鐘之鐘不圜。〕　謹照周禮考工記原文註改疏。應鐘改應律。

Basic explanation of words
Luan
luán

Luan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［luán］
["Guang Yun" cut off the official, Ping Huan, come. ]
The traditional characters of "Lan 1".
(1) Wooden name. That is Luan Hua.
(2) The two corners of the bell mouth of an ancient musical instrument.
(3) The arch-shaped load-bearing structure between the building column and the beam.
(4) Thinness.
(5) Still round. The circle around the circle.
(6) The name of the ancient town. The Spring and Autumn Period belonged to Jin Dynasty, and its place was in the northwest of Zhao County, Hebei Province.
(7) Through "twin". Twins.
(8) Link "Luan". Refers to the bell used by ancient emperors to drive cars. Detailed "Lan Che".
(9) Last name. Han has Luan Bu.
Luan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] Luan; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 564 01
[Tang Yun] Lu Guan cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Lu Guan cut [Yun Hui] Lu Wan cut,? Yin Luan. [Said the text] Wood is like a bar. The doctor's mound is also a tree bar. [Zhou Li·Shu Ren Shu] The doctor's tomb is eight feet high and the tree is made of herbs. [Guang Yun] Make a tree with a luan. [Shanhaijing] The mountain of cloud and rain has the wooden names Luan, Huangmu, Chiji, Qianye, and the emperor Yan takes medicine. 【Tang Materia Medica】It is called Luan Jing. [Note] Luan Jing, stems and leaves are like heather.　[Materia Medica Don't Record] Luan Hua, the leaves are thin and thin like hibiscus, and the flowers are yellow and grow up like locust tree.　Luan Luan again, barren appearance. 【Poetry·Juniper Wind】Luan Luanxi, the thorny man.　The two corners of Zhongkou are Luan. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] Fu Shi is the clock, and the two Luan are called milling. 【Sparse】The bell of the ancient law is not round, but it is like the bell of the present, so it has two corners.　[Li Mingtang] Luan Che, there is also Yu's car. [Zheng's Note] Luan may be Luan.　[Bo Ya] Qu Yuan is called Luan. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Luan Zhiyanshi.　 Tan Luan again, bamboo appearance. [Mei Cheng·Tu Yuan Fu] Repairing bamboo and Tanluan.　Another last name. [Chun Qiu] After Luan Shu, Jin Qing was on her behalf. Mei Cheng "Tu Yuan Fu". Textual research: [[Note] The ancient bell is not rounded. 〕　I would like to modify the original note according to the Zhouli Kao Gongji. The bell should be changed to the law.
